content:
What is your opinion regarding unitful parameters in distributions?

https://github.com/JuliaStats/Distributions.jl/issues/1940
I feel like the "strong reason" for many issues is that no one's had a need for it / felt compelled to implement it.
I feel the same. Just want to double check it before spending time working on a PR.
Searching for past unitful issues shows the same question you asked in back in 2022 - I imagine the response would be the same
Apparently this has been discussed by multiple people in the past, without much progress on the Distributions.jl package itself.
Júlio Hoffimann has marked this topic as resolved.
I mean, it does seem like they would review a PR judging from those past issues
Just happens to be a lot of work

There is an open PR for Exponential, but no progress. I am afraid of working on it and wasting my time without a prior agreement on what is the minimum amount of work needed to get the changes merged.
Tell me about it. This is often a bar to me making a PR.
Yes. The current maintainer is very reluctant to change. I will start looking into MeasureTheory.jl because Distributions.jl is frozen in time.

John Lapeyre said:

This is often a bar to me making a PR.

To be clear, I was not talking about Distributions.jl in particular.
